description: Bundle of Plazma Burst 2 and Plazma Burst:FTTP
notes: There are 2 versions in the 'data' install directory!!  You have to open each one of them manually, by going into the said directory and open up the standalone flash player named 'flashplayer11_7r700_224_win_sa.exe', selecting File > Open and Browse for the specific .SWF file you wish to load. When you have selected the one you want you press OK, then you wait a second or two and click on Control > Play
